State Regulations
D.R.L. ยง 113 Adoption Form 1-E
[This form must be submitted (Affirmation

Regarding Venue) in cases where the adoption petition was filed before (9/2006)
a judge other than the judge who heard the most recent Family Court
proceeding]
FAMILY COURT OF THE STATE OF NEW
YORK
COUNTY OF

judicial surrender executed before Judge [specify]: in Family Court, [specify
county]: on [specify date]: in Docket # [specify]: extra-judicial surrender approved by Judge
[specify]: in Family Court, [specify county]: on [specify date]: in Docket #

3. Upon information and belief, according

information]: the child's most recent permanency hearing was held before
[specify judge or referee] in Family Court, [specify county]:, on [specify
date]: 4. This adoption proceeding has been filed
before this Court for the following reasons [check applicable box(es) and
explain]: This Court is more familiar with the facts
and circumstances regarding permanency planning for, and the needs and best
interests of, this child, because [specify]: The child's law guardian [specify]: is

in [specify county]: This Court will be able to proceed in this
matter more expeditiously because [specify]: Other [specify]: WHEREFORE, for the reasons stated above, I
